alert.note: Alert for Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 4:56PM CDT until June 27 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Pine County in east central Minnesota... Southwestern Burnett County in northwestern Wisconsin... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 455 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brook Park, or near Hinckley, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pine City around 510 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Grantsburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
